channel.title: Great Relaxation Music
channel.itunes:author: GreatRelaxationMusic.com
channel.description: The Great Relaxation Music podcast features selected songs from our catalog of beautiful relaxation music CDs.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Great Relaxation Music
channel.itunes:summary: The Great Relaxation Music podcast features selected songs from our catalog of beautiful relaxation music CDs.

item.title: This Week We Feature SEVEN Tracks from BIG SUR
item.itunes:author: contact@greatrelaxationmusic.com
item.description: Great Relaxation Music presents seven tracks from the Big Sur CD.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this week's GRM podcast, we listen to SEVEN sample tracks from the BIG SUR CD. SPONSOR: LivingInLV.com
item.itunes:summary: In this week's GRM podcast, we listen to SEVEN sample tracks from the BIG SUR CD. SPONSOR: LivingInLV.com

item.title: This Week's Featured CD -- The Luxury of Love
item.itunes:author: contact@greatrelaxationmusic.com
item.description: Great Relaxation Music presents music from The Luxury of Love CD.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this week's GRM podcast, we listen to samples of THE LUXURY OF LOVE, a perfect musical example of how to combine romance with relaxation. SPONSOR: LivingInLV.com
item.itunes:summary: In this week's GRM podcast, we listen to samples of THE LUXURY OF LOVE, a perfect musical example of how to combine romance with relaxation. SPONSOR: LivingInLV.com

item.itunes:subtitle: In this week's GRM podcast, we listen to samples of OCEAN LIGHT, a beautiful CD that pays tribute to sounds of the ocean. SPONSOR: LivingInLV.com
